title: PowerToys 0.56 is out with FancyZones and mouse utility improvements
content:
Microsoft has released a new version of its PowerToys suite of tools, bringing it to version 0.56.1. This update focuses less on brand-new features, but it does bring some notable improvements to existing ones, such as FancyZones and the mouse utilities, specifically Find My Mouse. Another noteworthy change is that new PowerToys updates now include

The post PowerToys 0.56 is out with FancyZones and mouse utility improvements appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Microsoft is rolling out PowerToys version 0.56.1, adding various improvements to existing features including FancyZones and Find My Mouse.
